price: Enti Yε’gyee no ne nsuom hyεn no mu foͻ no (frii nsu yire no mu), na Yε’yεε no nsεnkyerεnee demaa amansan.
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلسَّفِينَةِ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu wa-aṣḥāba al-safīnati wajaʿalnāhā āyatan lil'ʿālamīna
